alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:02AM EST until February 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Western Rutland and Eastern Windsor Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of moderate to heavy snow will develop this evening before changing to a wintry mix overnight. Snowfall rates of near 1 inch per hour and visibilities down to a half mile will occur at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
